snippet.title: Hermit Simulator - Teaser
snippet.description:
Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2608310/hermit_simulator
VK Play: https://vkplay.ru/play/game/hermit_simulator

[EN - RU]
Discord: https://discord.gg/28bF4Bv6C2

[EN]
Telegram: https://t.me/hermitsimulator
X: https://x.com/hermitsimulator
Reddit: https://www.reddit.com/r/hermitsimulator

[RU]
Telegram: https://t.me/hermitsimulator_ru
VK: https://vk.com/hermitsimulator

Being a hermit is not easy, but it is the way to freedom, where you have to survive and build a new home. Farming, hunting, fishing, gathering, building, crafting, trading and exploration await you in the hermit simulator! Will you be able to survive on your way and become the master of the forest?

HERMIT SIMULATOR IN OPEN WORLD IS WAITING FOR YOU SOON!
Leave the routine and bustle of the metropolis, become a modern hermit farmer! Go into the deep atmospheric forest with your dog and build a new home.

FARMING
Engage in animal husbandry and crop production. There are several species of animals and plants at your disposal. Buy, grow, raise, breed and sell!

SURVIVAL
Keep track of the hero's indicators and don't let him die, and also don't forget about your best four-legged friend. Get food and water, but don't get caught in the fangs of a predator!

HUNTING AND FISHING
Make a trap or a primitive spear and go to the nearest pond to get fish! You can eat or sell the extracted meat in your stand.

TRADING
Place your products and extracted resources on the stand near the highway and sell them to customers visiting you. The larger the assortment, the higher the earnings!

GATHERING
Walk through the forest and pick up branches, stones, mushrooms, cones and wild berries! Collected resources are always needed in everyday life or trade.

BUILDING
Chop down trees, then craft planks and other materials to build everything you need, from a paddock to a hangar and your own hut!

CRAFTING
Craft the necessary items and objects from the collected resources. It can be an axe or a bonfire!

EXPLORATION
Open the map, mark the place you want to visit and go hiking towards adventures and beautiful views! But don't forget to be properly equipped.
